description: Enterprise techniques used by Dok, ATT&CK software S0281 v1.1
name: Dok (S0281)

techniques.comment: [Dok](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0281) persists via a plist login item.(Citation: objsee mac malware 2017)
[Dok](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0281) uses AppleScript to create a login item for persistence.(Citation: objsee mac malware 2017)
[Dok](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0281) persists via a Launch Agent.(Citation: objsee mac malware 2017)
[Dok](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0281) prompts the user for credentials.(Citation: objsee mac malware 2017)
[Dok](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0281) downloads and installs Tor via homebrew.(Citation: objsee mac malware 2017)
[Dok](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0281) installs a root certificate to aid in man-in-the-middle actions.(Citation: objsee mac malware 2017)
